Package io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.util.io.repo

Class RepositoryInfoProvider

java.lang.Object
io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.util.io.repo.RepositoryInfoProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
GitHubRepositoryInfoProvider
public abstract class RepositoryInfoProvider extends Object
A utility Class that parses repository URIs and attempts to fetch information about said repositories.

  • Method Details

    • getRepoInfoAsync

      public static final void getRepoInfoAsync(URI repoUri, net.minecraft.util.thread.ThreadExecutor<?> minecraftClientOrServer, Consumer<@Nullable RepositoryInfo> onReady, Consumer<Exception> onError) throws NullPointerException
      Attempts to obtain RepositoryInfo about a given repository using its URI.
      Parameters:
      repoUri - The URI representing the repository.
      minecraftClientOrServer - An instance of the MinecraftClient or the MinecraftServer.
      onReady - A Consumer that is invoked if the fetching is successful.
      onError - A Consumer that is invoked if the fetching fails.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If an argument is null.
      See Also:
      • TRegistries.REPO_INFO_PROVIDER

    • getUserInfoAsync

      public static final void getUserInfoAsync(URI userUri, net.minecraft.util.thread.ThreadExecutor<?> minecraftClientOrServer, Consumer<@Nullable RepositoryUserInfo> onReady, Consumer<Exception> onError) throws NullPointerException
      Attempts to obtain RepositoryUserInfo about a given user using their URI.
      Parameters:
      userUri - The URI representing the user.
      minecraftClientOrServer - An instance of the MinecraftClient or the MinecraftServer.
      onReady - A Consumer that is invoked if the fetching is successful.
      onError - A Consumer that is invoked if the fetching fails.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If an argument is null.
      See Also:
      • TRegistries.REPO_INFO_PROVIDER

    • fetchRepoInfoSync

      @Nullable public abstract @Nullable RepositoryInfo fetchRepoInfoSync(URI repoUri) throws NullPointerException, IOException
      Attempts to fetch information about a given repository using its URI.
      Parameters:
      repoUri - The repository URI.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If an argument is null.
      IOException - If an IOException is raised while fetching the info.

    • fetchUserInfoSync

      @Nullable public abstract @Nullable RepositoryUserInfo fetchUserInfoSync(URI userUri) throws NullPointerException, IOException
      Attempts to fetch information about a given user on a repository hosting platform, using the user's URI.
      Parameters:
      userUri - The URI of the user.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If an argument is null.
      IOException - If an IOException is raised while fetching the info.

    • getUriPathEntries

      public static final String[] getUriPathEntries(URI uri) throws NullPointerException
      Returns URI.getPath() in form of a String array, with any "blank" parts filtered out, including the first part. If the URI does not have a path, an empty array will be returned.
      Parameters:
      uri - The URI.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException
